meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shrewish.
meanings.sent1: Her constant shrewishness made it hard to have a peaceful conversation.
meanings.sent2: The shrewishness of her tone was evident in every word she spoke.
meanings.sent3: Despite her shrewishness, she had a soft spot for stray animals.
meanings.sent4: The shrewishness of the storm matched her fierce temper.
meanings.sent5: The shrewishness of the old witch scared the children away.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a shrew.
meanings.sent1: His wife's shrewishness was a constant source of frustration for him.
meanings.sent2: The shrewishness of the small rodent surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The shrewishness of the squirrel made it difficult to catch.
meanings.sent4: Her shrewishness in the office earned her the nickname 'The Shrew'.
meanings.sent5: The shrewishness of the character in the play added comic relief.
